scripts.build:stage: npm run prebuild && ng build --output-hashing bundles --base-href /tools/ --target=production --environment=stage
scripts.build:dev: npm run prebuild && ng build --output-hashing bundles --base-href /tools/ --target=development --environment=dev
scripts.build:prod: npm run prebuild && ng build --output-hashing bundles --base-href /tools/ --target=production --environment=prod
scripts.build:demo: npm run prebuild && ng build --output-hashing bundles --base-href /ng2-tools-page/ --target=development --environment=dev
scripts.build:docker: npm run prebuild && ng build --output-hashing bundles --base-href /tools/ --target=production --environment=docker
scripts.start:blue: npm run build:prod && mkdir -p logs && forever start -l forever.log -o logs/out.log -e logs/error.log -a -p logs --minUptime 1000 --spinSleepTime 1000 ./node_modules/.bin/ws -d dist -p 3001 --rewrite '/assets/fonts/* -> /tools/assets/fonts/$1' '/assets/images/* -> /tools/assets/images/$1' '/tools/bubbles -> /tools/' '/tools/map -> /tools/' '/tools/mountain -> /tools/'
scripts.start:dev: npm run build:dev && npm run start:local-web-server
